verses.verse: The vision <S%H2377><s%> of Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amoz <S%H531><s%>, which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%>, Jotham <S%H3147><s%>, Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, and Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and give ear <S%H238><s%>, O earth <S%H776><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>, I have nourished <S%H1431><s%> and brought up <S%H7311><s%> children <S%H1121><s%>, and they have rebelled <S%H6586><s%> against me.

The ox <S%H7794><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> his owner <S%H7069><s%>, and the ass <S%H2543><s%> his master's <S%H1167><s%> crib <S%H18><s%>: but Israel <S%H3478><s%> doth not know <S%H3045><s%>, my people <S%H5971><s%> doth not consider <S%H995><s%>.

Ah <S%H1945><s%> sinful <S%H2398><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> laden <S%H3515><s%> with iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, a seed <S%H2233><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%>, children <S%H1121><s%> that are corrupters <S%H7843><s%>: they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, they have provoked <S%H5006><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto anger <S%H5006><s%>, they are gone away <S%H2114><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>. laden: Heb. of heaviness gone: Heb. alienated, or, separated

Why should ye be stricken <S%H5221><s%> any more? ye will revolt <S%H5627><s%> more and more <S%H3254><s%>: the whole head <S%H7218><s%> is sick <S%H2483><s%>, and the whole heart <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H1742><s%>. revolt: Heb. increase revolt

From the sole <S%H3709><s%> of the foot <S%H7272><s%> even unto the head <S%H7218><s%> there is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in it; but wounds <S%H6482><s%>, and bruises <S%H2250><s%>, and putrifying <S%H2961><s%> sores <S%H4347><s%>: they have not been closed <S%H2115><s%>, neither bound up <S%H2280><s%>, neither mollified <S%H7401><s%> with ointment <S%H8081><s%>. ointment: or, oil

Your country <S%H776><s%> is desolate <S%H8077><s%>, your cities <S%H5892><s%> are burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: your land <S%H127><s%>, strangers <S%H2114><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> it in your presence, and it is desolate <S%H8077><s%>, as overthrown <S%H4114><s%> by strangers <S%H2114><s%>. overthrown: Heb. the overthrow of

And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> is left <S%H3498><s%> as a cottage <S%H5521><s%> in a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, as a lodge <S%H4412><s%> in a garden of cucumbers <S%H4750><s%>, as a besieged <S%H5341><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>.

Except <S%H3884><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> had left <S%H3498><s%> unto us a very small <S%H4592><s%> remnant <S%H8300><s%>, we should have been <S%H1961><s%> as Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and we should have been like <S%H1819><s%> unto Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, ye rulers <S%H7101><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>; give ear <S%H238><s%> unto the law <S%H8451><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, ye people <S%H5971><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>.

To what <S%H4100><s%> purpose is the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> unto me? saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: I am full <S%H7646><s%> of the burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of fed beasts <S%H4806><s%>; and I delight <S%H2654><s%> not in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, or of lambs <S%H3532><s%>, or of he goats <S%H6260><s%>. he goats: Heb. great he goats

When ye come <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, who hath required <S%H1245><s%> this at your hand <S%H3027><s%>, to tread <S%H7429><s%> my courts <S%H2691><s%>? to appear: Heb. to be seen

Bring <S%H935><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> oblations <S%H4503><s%>; incense <S%H7004><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto me; the new moons <S%H2320><s%> and sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, the calling <S%H7121><s%> of assemblies <S%H4744><s%>, I cannot away with <S%H3201><s%>; it is iniquity <S%H205><s%>, even the solemn meeting <S%H6116><s%>. iniquity: or, grief

Your new moons <S%H2320><s%> and your appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> hateth <S%H8130><s%>: they are a trouble <S%H2960><s%> unto me; I am weary <S%H3811><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> them.

And when ye spread forth <S%H6566><s%> your hands <S%H3709><s%>, I will hide <S%H5956><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> from you: yea, when ye make many <S%H7235><s%> prayers <S%H8605><s%>, I will not hear <S%H8085><s%>: your hands <S%H3027><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>. make: Heb. multiply prayer blood: Heb. bloods

Wash <S%H7364><s%> you, make you clean <S%H2135><s%>; put away <S%H5493><s%> the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%> from before <S%H5048><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>; cease <S%H2308><s%> to do evil <S%H7489><s%>;

Learn <S%H3925><s%> to do well <S%H3190><s%>; seek <S%H1875><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>, relieve <S%H833><s%> the oppressed <S%H2541><s%>, judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, plead <S%H7378><s%> for the widow <S%H490><s%>. relieve: or, righten

Come now <S%H3212><s%>, and let us reason together <S%H3198><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: though your sins <S%H2399><s%> be as scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, they shall be as white <S%H3835><s%> as snow <S%H7950><s%>; though they be red <S%H119><s%> like crimson <S%H8438><s%>, they shall be as wool <S%H6785><s%>.
If ye be willing <S%H14><s%> and obedient <S%H8085><s%>, ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>:

But if ye refuse <S%H3985><s%> and rebel <S%H4784><s%>, ye shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>: for the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

How is the faithful <S%H539><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> become an harlot <S%H2181><s%>! it was full <S%H4392><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%>; righteousness <S%H6664><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> in it; but now murderers <S%H7523><s%>.
Thy silver <S%H3701><s%> is become dross <S%H5509><s%>, thy wine <S%H5435><s%> mixed <S%H4107><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>:

Thy princes <S%H8269><s%> are rebellious <S%H5637><s%>, and companions <S%H2270><s%> of thieves <S%H1590><s%>: every one loveth <S%H157><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%>, and followeth <S%H7291><s%> after rewards <S%H8021><s%>: they judge <S%H8199><s%> not the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, neither doth the cause <S%H7379><s%> of the widow <S%H490><s%> come <S%H935><s%> unto them.

Therefore saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%>, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the mighty One <S%H46><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Ah <S%H1945><s%>, I will ease <S%H5162><s%> me of mine adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, and avenge <S%H5358><s%> me of mine enemies <S%H341><s%>:

And I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thee, and purely <S%H1253><s%> purge away <S%H6884><s%> thy dross <S%H5509><s%>, and take away <S%H5493><s%> all thy tin <S%H913><s%>: purely: Heb. according to pureness

And I will restore <S%H7725><s%> thy judges <S%H8199><s%> as at the first <S%H7223><s%>, and thy counsellors <S%H3289><s%> as at the beginning <S%H8462><s%>: afterward <S%H310><s%> thou shalt be called <S%H7121><s%>, The city <S%H5892><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, the faithful <S%H539><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>.
Zion <S%H6726><s%> shall be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> with judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and her converts <S%H7725><s%> with righteousness <S%H6666><s%>. her: or, they that return of her

And the destruction <S%H7667><s%> of the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> and of the sinners <S%H2400><s%> shall be together <S%H3162><s%>, and they that forsake <S%H5800><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%>. destruction: Heb. breaking

For they shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of the oaks <S%H352><s%> which ye have desired <S%H2530><s%>, and ye shall be confounded <S%H2659><s%> for the gardens <S%H1593><s%> that ye have chosen <S%H977><s%>.
For ye shall be as an oak <S%H424><s%> whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> fadeth <S%H5034><s%>, and as a garden <S%H1593><s%> that hath no water <S%H4325><s%>.

And the strong <S%H2634><s%> shall be as tow <S%H5296><s%>, and the maker <S%H6467><s%> of it as a spark <S%H5213><s%>, and they shall both <S%H8147><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and none shall quench <S%H3518><s%> them. maker: or, and his work
